[File: aptos-core/api/types/src/error.rs] [Struct: AptosError] [Thread Safety] Is AptosError safe to share across threads in the API server, or could concurrent access to error instances cause data races? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/api/types/src/error.rs] [Test: test_serialize_deserialize] [Fuzzing Coverage] Are there fuzz tests for error deserialization to catch crashes or panics when processing malformed error payloads from untrusted sources? (High)

[File: aptos-core/api/types/src/error.rs] [Test: test_serialize_deserialize] [Edge Case Coverage] Does the test cover edge cases like extremely long messages, special Unicode characters, or maximum u64 vm_error_code values? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/api/types/src/error.rs] [Enum: AptosErrorCode] [Error Code Confusion] Can clients confuse similar error codes (e.g., 101-109 all being 'NotFound' variants) leading to incorrect error handling and security bypasses? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/api/types/src/error.rs] [Enum: AptosErrorCode] [Error Recovery] Do error codes provide sufficient information for clients to safely retry operations, or could retry logic based on error codes cause safety violations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/api/types/src/error.rs] [Enum: AptosErrorCode] [Backward Compatibility] If new error codes are added in future versions, could old clients misinterpret them as existing codes, causing security vulnerabilities? (Medium)
